grid: Form the word by mixing the vertical sound with horizontal sounds. Drag the word from the bottom and put it in the correct place.
balancing: Compare the number of fruits on both the sides. Use the = sign when the number on both sides are equal. Use < sign when number on the right is bigger. Use > sign when number on the left is bigger.
